title: Account Names
body: I've been playing League for a while and my "name" preferences have changed over that time. My original name is "UBERMAN2" but i've recently been calling myself in games "Phantasm". This wouldn't be a problem usually but i discovered that not only has that name been used but the account was used last 2-3 years ago. So i was just wondering if accounts were ever removed or deleted if they haven't been used for a certain period of time.

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914

that name has 2 years and 6 months of protection, so it won't be available until  about may 2017 if it still stays inactive
